articles.title: About
articles.contents:
Contents
Purpose

Purpose
The purpose of this site is clarify the history of the Glenbervie area of Wellington, and to raise larger themes.
My email address for contact is: joseph.bulbulia@vuw.ac.nz

            I’m a professor of psychology in the Faculty of Science at Victoria University of Wellington. I work in the areas of cultural evolution, religion, longitudinal research, wellbeing, and the good life.
            The views expressed here are my own.
            My email contact is: joseph.bulbulia@vuw.ac.nz
